name: Stephen Odell
bio: Steve is the VP of Engineering at Viagio Technologies, a Top 10 Small Business in KC that focuses on helping their clients bring to fruition their product ideas through software development. Steve has a strong passion for technology and loves to learn new languages, frameworks, and ways of doing things. He has a strong drive to build software that finds the right balance between pragmatism and high quality software design principles. His passion for technology is only exceeded by his passion for leadership and helping other people grow and flourish in their own careers.
